OG.content: Saussure’s arbitrary sign functions w/in interior natural sound
OG.linkedContent: Saussure’s arbitrary sign functions w/in interior natural sound

OG.content: [Derrida’s deconstruction of Saussure] if “writing” signifies inscription & the durability of the sign, then the very idea of institution (hence the arbitrariness of the sign) is unthinkable outside writing, unthinkable outside horizon itself, outside world as space of inscription > opening to spatial distribution of signs (regulated play) [overturn opposition physis/nomos]
OG.linkedContent: [Derrida’s deconstruction of Saussure] if “writing” signifies inscription & the durability of the sign, then the very idea of institution (hence the arbitrariness of the sign) is unthinkable outside writing, unthinkable outside horizon itself, outside world as space of inscription > opening to spatial distribution of signs (regulated play) [overturn opposition physis/nomos]

OG.content: passivity of speech can’t be distinguished from relation btwn unconsciousness of language and spacing (pause, blank, punctuation, interval) that constitutes origin of signification in general
OG.linkedContent: passivity of speech can’t be distinguished from relation btwn unconsciousness of language and spacing (pause, blank, punctuation, interval) that constitutes origin of signification in general

OG.content: becoming-space of time & becoming-time of space mark dead time w/in presence of living present > dead time is at work, les blancs take on importance > limit of phenomenology
OG.linkedContent: becoming-space of time & becoming-time of space mark dead time w/in presence of living present > dead time is at work, les blancs take on importance > limit of phenomenology

OG.content: spacing as writing is the becoming-absent, becoming-unconscious of the subject
OG.linkedContent: spacing as writing is the becoming-absent, becoming-unconscious of the subject

OG.content: the horizontality of spacing, hollow of differance, discontinuity and discreteness (does not oppose it(self) like surface to depth), a hinge (brisure) marking impossibility of full speech
OG.linkedContent: the horizontality of spacing, hollow of differance, discontinuity and discreteness (does not oppose it(self) like surface to depth), a hinge (brisure) marking impossibility of full speech

OG.content: proper name becomes appellation (symbolic value [?]) only when inscribed w/in figuration > proper-ness of name does not escape spacing: parousia of voice, presence to self of logos w/in voice, absolute hearing-oneself-speak, is a function responding to an indestructible but relative necessity w/in system that encompasses it
OG.linkedContent: proper name becomes appellation (symbolic value [?]) only when inscribed w/in figuration > proper-ness of name does not escape spacing: parousia of voice, presence to self of logos w/in voice, absolute hearing-oneself-speak, is a function responding to an indestructible but relative necessity w/in system that encompasses it

OG.content: writing as possibility of road? violent spacing of nature, silva is savage, via rupta is written, form imposed on hylè
OG.linkedContent: writing as possibility of road? violent spacing of nature, silva is savage, via rupta is written, form imposed on hylè

OG.content: Rousseau: philosophy ensured separation of speech & music > Rousseau tries to efface the toujours-déjà of spacing by calling it a catastrophic event: the birth of philosophy out of Greek tragedy (the perfection of grammar of song)
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau: philosophy ensured separation of speech & music > Rousseau tries to efface the toujours-déjà of spacing by calling it a catastrophic event: the birth of philosophy out of Greek tragedy (the perfection of grammar of song)

OG.content: trait permits imitation, donner lieu to art as mimesis, possibility of iteration, this life & death of art > technique & imitation: opens space of calculation (grammaticality, scientific intervals)
OG.linkedContent: trait permits imitation, donner lieu to art as mimesis, possibility of iteration, this life & death of art > technique & imitation: opens space of calculation (grammaticality, scientific intervals)

OG.content: trait is spacing itself, marks figures, works on surface of painting & time of music
OG.linkedContent: trait is spacing itself, marks figures, works on surface of painting & time of music

OG.content: Rousseau declares what he wishes to say: writing/articulation are post-originary malady; he describes what he does not wish to say: articulation (space of writing) at origin of language
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau declares what he wishes to say: writing/articulation are post-originary malady; he describes what he does not wish to say: articulation (space of writing) at origin of language

OG.content: what he describes takes place for better or worse, annuls eschatology & teleology just as differance (originary articulation) annuls archeology
OG.linkedContent: what he describes takes place for better or worse, annuls eschatology & teleology just as differance (originary articulation) annuls archeology

OG.content: le langage n’a pu surgir qu’à partir de la dispersion
OG.linkedContent: le langage n’a pu surgir qu’à partir de la dispersion

OG.content: que le langage doive traverser l’espace, soit tenu de s’espacer, ce n’est pas là un trait accidentel mais le sceau de son origine—la dispersion originelle laisse sa marque dans le langage: articulation (which seems to introduce difference as an institution) has for ground/space dispersion that is natural: space itself
OG.linkedContent: que le langage doive traverser l’espace, soit tenu de s’espacer, ce n’est pas là un trait accidentel mais le sceau de son origine—la dispersion originelle laisse sa marque dans le langage: articulation (which seems to introduce difference as an institution) has for ground/space dispersion that is natural: space itself

OG.content: Rousseau [sometimes] places hieroglyphic, passionate langue before speech, a writing that is proximate and present, he praises this savage writing—traces like the wand (baguette), un dessin dans l’espace (writing)
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau [sometimes] places hieroglyphic, passionate langue before speech, a writing that is proximate and present, he praises this savage writing—traces like the wand (baguette), un dessin dans l’espace (writing)

OG.content: need as dispersion, as law of spacing, natural effect of needs separated man > culture the effect of an attempted reconciliation [need closer to nature, passion is purer language?]
OG.linkedContent: need as dispersion, as law of spacing, natural effect of needs separated man > culture the effect of an attempted reconciliation [need closer to nature, passion is purer language?]

OG.content: need explains eve of society and explains society’s extension, how it distributes/differentiates itself in space
OG.linkedContent: need explains eve of society and explains society’s extension, how it distributes/differentiates itself in space

OG.content: for Rousseau, present is always the presence of a jouissance, jouissance always the welcoming of presence > language (anxious research of learning): the spacing btwn 2 jouissances
OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, present is always the presence of a jouissance, jouissance always the welcoming of presence > language (anxious research of learning): the spacing btwn 2 jouissances

OG.content: writing in furrows (sillons), via rupta: if space were simply geometric, ideal, writing never would have broken from boustrophedon (turning of ox, left-right-right-left)
OG.linkedContent: writing in furrows (sillons), via rupta: if space were simply geometric, ideal, writing never would have broken from boustrophedon (turning of ox, left-right-right-left)

OG.content: space of geometric objectivity an ideal (object) produced/signified at moment of writing
OG.linkedContent: space of geometric objectivity an ideal (object) produced/signified at moment of writing

OG.content: [extremely Nietzschean description of difference & hierarchy] [re: heterogeneous factors of space to which one and same “proper” body relates, re: boustrophedon]
OG.linkedContent: [extremely Nietzschean description of difference & hierarchy] [re: heterogeneous factors of space to which one and same “proper” body relates, re: boustrophedon]

OG.content: imposition of form via spacing, beyond classical model of causality, a new transcendental aesthetic guided by inscription: writing, as Rousseau intuited, linked to nature of social space > inscription as habitation in general
OG.linkedContent: imposition of form via spacing, beyond classical model of causality, a new transcendental aesthetic guided by inscription: writing, as Rousseau intuited, linked to nature of social space > inscription as habitation in general

OG.content: from Kant to Husserl: Kantian revolution of pure passivity re: pure sensibility—still a linear, geometric, transcendental aesthetic; Husserl’s transcendental kinesthetic blurs lines btwn passive/active, puts all objective space in parentheses > but still living present
OG.linkedContent: from Kant to Husserl: Kantian revolution of pure passivity re: pure sensibility—still a linear, geometric, transcendental aesthetic; Husserl’s transcendental kinesthetic blurs lines btwn passive/active, puts all objective space in parentheses > but still living present
